forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of a late afternoon sun, Downtown San Francisco basks under a mostly clear sky tinted with the soft hues of early evening. The temperature hovers comfortably around sixty-five degrees, with a promise of warmth extending into the twilight hours. A light breeze, weaving through the streets at a brisk pace, hints at the coming change, as the forecast hints at a smattering of drizzle later on. While the sun sets behind the Golden Gate, a cozy overcast is already beginning to creep in, with a 20% chance of precipitation highlighting the delicate dance between the sun and the evolving clouds.

For those venturing outside, a light sweater or cardigan might offer just the right touch of warmth as the evening draws near, especially if one finds themselves along the waterfront, where whispers of a marine layer linger in the cool air. The evening holds potential for quiet strolls along the Embarcadero or casual meet-ups at one of the city's myriad cafés, where the glow of friendly conversation competes with the fading sunlight. As the day slides into night, embracing the calm and inviting atmosphere will be a delight for both the heart and mind.
